remarks: The point inversion function ` M ` is a bijection.  Theorem 7.11 of [Schwabhauser] p. 50.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Jun-2019.)
statement:
mirval.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
mirval.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.

mirval.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
mirfv.m $e |- M = ( S ` A ) $.
mirf1o $p |- ( ph -> M : P -1-1-onto-> P ) $.
